title: CLERKMANS Unisex Adult 62" Long Plain Graduation Stole Sash
features: Our graduation stole/sash can be matched with a graduation gown.
This sash can be used as graduation honor stole in graduation ceremonies for elementary, high school and university graduations and as a clergy choir stole for church activities.
13 Colors Available: Choose the color that best matches what you need
Our one-size-fits-all stole is the perfect accessory for a graduation gown and can be applied to graduation activities such as graduation photographs and graduation party.
Our traditional plain stoles are made of bridal satin and are easy to put on and comfortable to wear.
description: Unisex Traditional Graduation Stoles for High School & University Student Gowns for Graduation Ceremonies  We present our high-quality graduation stoles for gowns. Traditional graduation stole's shape made to fit for all body types. Our stole is each side is 31" long and 5" wide. This stole is convenient to hang with the neck’s design and back ends with arrow points. PRODUCT FEATURES: -  ✔ Our traditional graduation stole is made with high-quality material. ✔ Our Graduation traditional graduation stole looks great on graduation students gown. ✔ It is easy to wear with a soft touch and feel.
